title: Ranking - Pointers for climbing

embed.description: This site provides tools that allows summoners to calculate their solo ranking MMR and keep track of their performance on chart.

body:
Hi Guys,

I'm currently bronze 1 trying to get into silver. However every time I get into/near promos the same thing happens.  I go on some massive losing streak, and end up in like Bronze 3 and I have to climb back up all over again.  I generally duo with my mate Subdue666, so you'll see his name in a lot of my games (he is currently b3). 

Now I know I'm not the best player by far, but I know that I generally do well in my chosen lane.  I can play all roles except ADC.  I don't have the skill or mechanics for that.  Now very often when I'm losing lane, I can see it happening (or about to happen) so I ask for a gank or two to try help me get ahead.  This is generally never done, because I haven't poked them down or because "they're fed" even though they're only 1 or 2 kills in.  On the other hand if I'm doing extremely well, which is usually the case when Subdue and I duo bot lane we get 4 man ganked every 3 minutes and our team refuses to either a) help defend the turret or b) push their turret.

Now, I'm not complaining the team is bad entirely.  For example when subdue and I were playing bot we got double kill in the first 7 minutes or so bot lane, and then we started getting camped by mid {{champion:76}} .  Our {{champion:99}}  at the time was doing extremely well smashing her lane too. However when {{champion:76}} ganked there was no mia and we were warded up but a {{champion:76}} q is quite a long hit and we were well into our fight.    {{champion:99}} then never took turret or came bot to ulti for a double kill.  Eventually we lost this game due to not capitalizing on the roams.  In another case our {{champion:38}} refused to roam, when his mid lane roamed to every lane every 2 minutes.

I would like to know a few things.  What is the best thing to do in these situations?  How can I get mid to either roam, mia or push turrets to at least counter the issue?  What would be beneficial if I was top or jng in these situations? Should i relinquish my farm/turret to help other push their lanes? should I attempt a lane swap? What would be the best way to address the issues occurring?

I found a really good site that can show you play by play as well if you want to take a look at what has happened and the mistakes I made during these games (it is linked already - just make sure you search under oce).  Just search my history if you feel the need.

Remember even though I'm pointing out that they have made mistakes, I am wanting to know how I can improve to fix them,..  I already know where my mistakes lie and where to improve.  But not how to handle situations like the above.

replies.body: Map awareness, learn to dodge skillshots! Have a friend play Nidalee or Ezreal, and have them surprise you with a few skillshots in betweem your 1 v 1, first to Inhib wins! :)
That's a really neat idea.. thanks
Warding is the best counter to roams. If when the enemy roams he walks past a ward, he's just wasted 40 seconds of his time.
Like I said, I always ward.  But champs like nid have good roam potential so even when I ward near dragon she can still hit us when we're backing

You should be able to dodge if you're up against a champion that you know has a skillshot long enough to get you even when caught on wards.

Or just stay if you're confident enough to 3v2 and you're already in a good position.
